casebody.data:
RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2009-0580. Erwin v. Bryan.

Tuscarawas App. No. 08-CA-28, 2009-Ohio-758. Reported at 125 Ohio St.3d 519, 2010-Ohio-2202, 929 N.E.2d 1019. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.

Brown, C.J., and Pfeifer, J., dissent. Diane V. Grendell, J., of the Eleventh Appellate District, sitting for Cupp, J.
